  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(Map map, char flag1, char flag2, int redBots, int blueBots)
      Constructs a new Game instance with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      map - The map on which the game will be played.
      flag1 - The character representing the location of the red team flag.
      flag2 - The character representing the location of the blue team flag.
      redBots - Number of red team bots.
      blueBots - Number of blue team bots.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(String startingPlayer)
      Initializes the game by setting up the map, flags, and bots.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface GameADT
      Parameters:
      startingPlayer - The player who starts the game.

    • start

      public void start(String startingPlayer)
      Starts the game loop.
      Specified by:
      start in interface GameADT
      Parameters:
      startingPlayer - The player who starts the game.

    • playRound

      private Bot playRound(Bot currentBot)
      Plays a round of the game.
      Parameters:
      currentBot - The bot whose turn it is to play.
      Returns:
      The next bot to play.

    • gameOver

      private boolean gameOver(Bot bot, String startingPlayer)
      Checks if the game is over.
      Parameters:
      bot - The bot whose turn it is to play.
      startingPlayer - The player who starts the game.
      Returns:
      True, if the game is over, otherwise false.

    • executeMove

      private void executeMove(Bot currentBot)
      Executes a move for the current bot.
      Parameters:
      currentBot - The bot whose move is to be executed.

    • defend

      private void defend(Bot bot)
      Defends the base if the bot's algorithm is set to defense. Moves the bot towards the base using the shortest path algorithm if it's not already at the base.
      Parameters:
      bot - The bot to defend the base.

    • play

      private void play(Bot currentBot, Location start, Location end)
      Executes a move for the current bot based on its algorithm. Moves the bot using the corresponding algorithm (Shortest Path, MST, or DFS).
      Parameters:
      currentBot - The bot whose move is to be executed.
      start - The starting location of the move.
      end - The destination location of the move.

    • canRecaptureFlag

      private boolean canRecaptureFlag(Bot currentBot)
      Checks if the current bot can recapture its team's flag from a contested location. If an enemy bot holds the flag and is in the same location, the flag is recaptured.
      Parameters:
      currentBot - The bot attempting to recapture the flag.
      Returns:
      True if the flag was recaptured, otherwise false.

    • moveVisualizer

      public void moveVisualizer(Bot currentBot)
      Visualizes the bot's move on the map and updates the game status. Highlights the edge between the previous and current location of the bot.
      Specified by:
      moveVisualizer in interface GameADT
      Parameters:
      currentBot - The bot whose move is to be visualized.

    • addBot

      public void addBot(Bot bot)
      Adds a new bot to the game.
      Specified by:
      addBot in interface GameADT
      Parameters:
      bot - The bot to be added to the game.
